pageContext.claim: “[Paul Ryan] wouldn't give subpoenas, whereas Nancy Pelosi hands them out like they're cookies. Paul Ryan was a lame duck for a long time as Speaker.”
pageContext.analysis: This is nonsense. House Republicans (under then-Speaker Paul D. Ryan (R-Ohio) issued more than 70 subpoenas and letters between July 5 and Sept. 29, 2016 alone.
